page.title: 09ST.STEPHEN'S C.P.INFANT SCH.
page.content: {State} Founders K.C.C.1970(separated from Juniors){Pupils}214(mixed){Ages} 5-7 {Staff}8 {Subjects}full range(inc. Science,R.E.){Sports Facilities}gym. (School hall){Uniform}green,white/grey The Infants have corridor library and weekly library sessions in the hall. {Pupil Christopher's play-time}:"Before play-time some people take milk bottles with milk in,if their mummys have paid. Play-time is a time when we can go into the school grounds(play ground) and play". This is the last school in the compulsory education age range.There are great differences between the various establishments.However the child who wanders around the corridors of the Infant School looking for a book,may one day reach the University Library,stocked with 472,000 volumes.
